commits.message: 🗃️ Better auto-detection of datasets that are specified as constructor functions.
⚙️ Grouping of tasks by mutually exclusive subsets of components.
🚚 Include last batch of dataset even if it's not full.
⚙️ Terminate immediately when CTRL+X pressed.
🗃️ Registry understands factory functions to create components.
🚚 Batches can be constructed from dicts of tensors.
📚 Include recent docopt changes.
🗃️ Components can be reloaded from pretrained if --resume specified.
🚚 Dataset can be created from list of custom objects.
🚚 Dataset can be created from list of custom objects.
📁 Match files by substring search, ignore non-python extensions.

payload.description: 🚃 Automated task/test framework for writing differentiable software.

commits.message: 📦 Prototype version 0.0.5 with improved datasets.
📚 Documentation for different supported dataset types.
📚 Documentation for different supported dataset types.
📚 Documentation for different supported dataset types.
☑️ Automated tests for RST documentation with Sybil.
⏲️ Configuration of learning rate and optimizer class via decorators.
⏲️ Configure the number of epochs via decorator.
🚚 Datasets can return Batch() objects directly for more efficiency and flexibility.
🚚 Datasets as array-compatible objects with __getitem__.
📁 Add current working directory to Python path.
📖 Specify device to use for optimization on command-line.

payload.description: 🚃 Automated task/test framework for writing differentiable software.

commits.message: 📦 Prototype version 0.0.4 with training/validation phases.
🏗️ Skip validation phase if there's no data.
🛠️ Example of specifying dataset as an iterator.
🌻 Project-specific ignore settings.
🏗️ Run training loop then validation loop for each group.
🚚 Support datasets created from iterators.
💾 Saving only the model state_dict to disk as snapshot.
🗃️ Support for creating components and datasets on specific device.
✏️ Improve formatting in Windows Terminal.
